name: unseasonable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not usual or expected for the time of year: When you're used to snow in January, warm sunny weather feels unseasonable.

Add to word list
Add to word list
(of weather) not usual for the time of year: We had an unseasonable warm spell in January.
